welcome.title: Welcome to ExCaller
welcome.description: This is a simple random call tool.

welcome.title: Start calling
welcome.description: Click the green button to start calling.

welcome.title: Settings
welcome.description: Click the blue button to open the settings page.

stopRolling.title: Stop rolling
stopRolling.description: Click the red button to stop rolling.

namelist.title: Namelist feature
namelist.description: It is what you think it is.

namelist.title: Batch import/export
namelist.description: You can batch add names, or import names from Excel. Of course, you can also export the list to a text file.

namelist.title: Multiple lists
namelist.description: You can create multiple lists, and different lists do not interfere with each other. Click the dropdown box to switch the currently effective list.

group.title: Group feature
group.description: You can group names, and narrow down the range of names to be called.

group.title: Enable group calling
group.description: Limiting the range of names to be called within the group.

plan.title: Plan feature
plan.description: You can enable Plan to control the next draws.

plan.title: But to prevent abuse
plan.description: After enabling the plan feature, the settings button will turn red.

orientation.title: Prefer Landscape Mode
orientation.content-1: ExCaller is designed to be used in landscape mode, and may have UI issues in portrait mode.
orientation.content-2: You can open the notification bar and enable "Auto-rotate", then rotate your device to landscape mode.

changelog.canary-tip: For the latest changes in the canary version, please visit {0}.

checksum.label: Checksum:
checksum.notes: Used to verify the integrity of {0}. If {0} is modified, the entire checksum will change

text.title: Batch Input
text.tip: One name per line, automatically remove leading and trailing spaces and empty lines.

name.confirm-deletion: Confirm deleting namelist {0}? This action cannot be undone!

settings.title: Settings

entry.unsupported: Due to technical limitations, please download the App to experience this feature

settings.canary: You are using the Canary version, which is considered as unstable. If you encounter any problems, please {1}.
settings.portable: The portable version may have some bugs, desktop version is recommended. If you encounter any problems, please {1}.

feedback.title: Send Feedback
feedback.desc: If you have any problems or suggestions while using ExCaller, feel free to send feedback to us.
feedback.methods: You can send feedback through either of the following ways:

gitee.message: If you cannot access GitHub, you can {0} on Gitee

feedback.canary: If the problem only occurs in the Canary version, please indicate in the feedback.
feedback.thanks: After receiving the feedback, we will process it as soon as possible. Thank you for your support.
feedback.contributing: Anyone can view the source code of ExCaller. If you know how to program, you are welcome to contribute on GitHub.
